meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable of being driven.
meanings.sent1: The drivabilities of the car impressed the buyers.
meanings.sent2: The drivabilities of electric vehicles are constantly improving.
meanings.sent3: The robot showed off its drivabilities by smoothly navigating the obstacle course.
meanings.sent4: Her drivabilities in handling difficult situations were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The drivabilities of the new engine design were put to the test on the race track.

meanings.definition: The ability to be driven or operated.
meanings.sent1: The drivabilities of the remote-controlled car delighted the children.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the drivabilities of different machines is crucial for mechanics.
meanings.sent3: The toaster's drivabilities were put to the test when it burnt the toast.
meanings.sent4: His drivabilities in using the new software were evident from the start.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship's drivabilities were essential for its successful mission to Mars.
